product_name: Mountain House Beef Stroganoff with Noodles - 2 Servings
long_description: This instant entree features tender beef chunks smothered in noodles, mushrooms and a rich sour cream sauce. Stand-up pouch creates an easy way to cook and eat your meal; made from high-barrier foil, the pouch keeps your meal hot. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided -- let stand, and serve. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This instant entree features tender beef chunks smothered in noodles, mushrooms and a rich sour cream sauce.
